scripts.build-run-app: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npm run start
scripts.run-app: cd client && npm run build && cd.. && npm run start
scripts.run-app-dev: cd client && npm run build && cd.. && npm run dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd client && npm install
